amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 726 from the bill relating to importation of prescription drugs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 110-290 to strike section 726 from the bill relating to importation of prescription drugs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kingston amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 283 (Roll no. 806).
